channel.title: Cleaning sections
channel.description:
Well, I've been thinking about how the Download section and the Tutorial section and how they have so many locked/invalid topics, so I was wondering if it would bother any of the other moderators if I was to remove the spam/locked/invalid topics from those two sections. Obviously I wont delete any 'stickied' locked topics. Please give your opinion.
*Edit: Spelling mistake.

item.title: Cleaning sections
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“TeleNubby, post:5, topic:236424”][quote author=Greeny link=topic=311993.msg2487152#msg2487152 date=1223916432]
Unfortunately, you can’t filter shit from shit.
[/quote]You can if the shit is green. <3[/quote]
lol’d at that
and tbh this has been done before and it never works just do what you can and swear at those who annoy you worked fro everyone else

Read full topic
